alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dale, southeastern Coffee, eastern Geneva and western Houston Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Geneva, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Novosel, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Level Plains, Slocomb, Newton, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Esto, Napier Field, Madrid and Coffee Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
